item.title: How i add range following and mage following
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

First you need following.

Then just check if the player is so and so steps away with the WithinDistance method, and if the player is, then follow him.
